services.title: Services
services.subtitle: Specialized legal solutions in immigration law, tailored to your personal circumstances and needs

service1.title: Homologation and validation of foreign degrees
service1.desc: Processes to have your studies and qualifications obtained abroad officially recognized in Spain, facilitating your professional and academic development.

service2.title: Visa management for residence in Spain
service2.desc:
We handle the comprehensive advisory and complete support in the application for your visa to enter and reside in Spain from the Consulate in your country of origin, offering you personalized guidance according to your situation and the purpose of your stay. We process, among others:
  • Visa for study purposes
  • Visa for non-lucrative residence
  • Visa for employment
  • Visa for self-employment / entrepreneurship
  • Visa for entrepreneurs
  • Visa for digital nomads
  • Visa for job search

service3.title: Residence and work permits
service3.desc: We advise and manage the processing of permits that allow you to legally reside and work in Spain, both as an employee and self-employed, ensuring that the process is smooth and secure.

service4.title: Applications and modifications of residence permits
service4.desc: We prepare and manage applications for new residence permits and their modifications, ensuring all documents and deadlines comply with current regulations.

service5.title: Temporary residence for exceptional circumstances - Arraigos
service5.desc:
If you find yourself irregularly and want residence for employment, we process and advise on residence for arraigo. There are various types:
  • Social arraigo
  • Socio-laboral arraigo
  • Family arraigo
  • Socio-informative arraigo
  • Second chance arraigo

service6.title: Spanish nationality procedures
service6.desc: We guide you through every step to obtain Spanish nationality, from document preparation to filing and tracking your application before the administration.

service7.title: Family reunification
service7.desc: We help you reunite with your family members by managing the family reunification procedure, ensuring compliance with legal requirements and providing support at every stage of the process.

service8.title: Residence for family members of EU citizens
service8.desc: We offer comprehensive advice to obtain or renew the residence of family members of European Union citizens, ensuring the correct preparation of documentation and compliance with European regulations.

service9.title: Exchange of foreign driving license
service9.desc: We help you carry out the procedure to exchange your driving license issued abroad for a Spanish license, ensuring you meet all legal and administrative requirements.

about.title: About Us
about.aboutme1: Aequalis Advocades was founded with the intention of accompanying and advising individuals who wish to build their life project in Spain. We believe in a law that is close, accessible, and human, where every story matters and every process is guided with responsibility and empathy.
about.aboutme2: My name is Gemma Regol Pratdepadua, I am a registered lawyer at the Il·lustre Col·legi d’Advocats de Mataró, graduated in Law from the Universidad Autónoma de Barcelona and trained in the Master's Degree in Access to the Bar at UNIR.
about.aboutme3: I have specialized in Immigration Law, directing my training and professional experience to this field, with specialization programs at INEAF Business School and additional courses at the Bar Association.
about.aboutme4: I decided to dedicate myself to Immigration Law because, since I was little, I have felt a special sensitivity towards social justice and, in particular, towards the stories of migration and the social realities faced by migrants. Over time, I understood that the law, apart from doing justice, can be a tool to open paths, accompany processes, and protect rights. That is the place from which I practice my profession.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.paragraph1: I accompany my clients in various processes such as visas, residence permits, Spanish nationality, arraigo, and family reunifications, among others. My commitment is to offer clear, transparent advice tailored to each personal situation.
mission.paragraph2: At Aequalis Advocades we work from closeness, listening, and respect. We know that migrating involves efforts, dreams, and courage. That is why our mission is to make that journey easier.

etymology.title: Etymology
etymology.aequalis: 'Aequalis' from Latin aequālis meaning 'equal' or 'fair'. This is the foundation of our legal practice.

about.founderNote: We are a law firm specialized in Immigration Law committed to a humane and rigorous practice.
about.4braves1: At Aequalis Advocades we collaborate with 4Braves España, an agency specialized in international mobility for students who wish to come to Spain to pursue their studies.
about.4braves2: From 4Braves, I am the lawyer responsible for the immigration area, in charge of the comprehensive processing of visas and residence permits for studies, as well as the regularization and migratory support of students throughout their process in Spain.
about.4braves3: We work together to offer a complete, clear, and secure service, covering everything from the selection of the academic program to the obtaining of the visa and the arrival in the country.
